comments.raw_text: With bug 696041, the Firefox version we are going to ship on Linux is going to require dbus-glib in addition of dbus.
comments.text: With bug 696041, the Firefox version we are going to ship on Linux is going to require dbus-glib in addition of dbus.

comments.author: karlt@mozbugz.karlt.net
comments.text: dbus-glib >= 0.60 according to configure.in.  Don't know whether or not our build system pulls in dependencies on newer symbols.
comments.creator: karlt@mozbugz.karlt.net
